title: Were the Play-in Games a Success? | The Answer
description:
Chris Ryan and Seerat Sohi start by deciding whether the play-in format was a success (0:54). Then they talk about what other changes the league could make (20:00) and wrap up by talking about a couple of the first-round matchups they're looking forward to (31:41).
Hosts: Chris Ryan and Seerat Sohi
Production Assistant: Isaiah Blakely
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
